{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3160681,"name":"Jacob Fisher","username":"fisherjacobc","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fisherjacobc/{size}/240838_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-09T11:55:02.943Z","cooked":"

Hi there!

My FRC Team is wanting to make a custom dashboard to well, put custom data values onto it for improved ease of use for the drivers. I have installed LabView and all the correct components via the NI Package Manager, but when I go to create a new project, I can’t find an FRC dashboard template.

Does anyone know how to access that, or would they be able to make a blank one and download it’s .vi/.viproj file and send it over?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":9,"updated_at":"2023-03-09T11:55:02.943Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":42,"reads":75,"readers_count":74,"score":240.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":429541,"topic_slug":"2023-labview-custom-dashboard","display_username":"Jacob Fisher","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":56841,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"339 Software Chairman"},"post_url":"/t/2023-labview-custom-dashboard/429541/1","custom_user_title":"339 Software Chairman","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3160690,"name":"Elmer Lee (head mentor)","username":"sthump","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sthump/{size}/211548_2.png","created_at":"2023-03-09T12:25:48.155Z","cooked":"

When you launch LabVIEW, you should get this:

image1014×842 33 KB

Click on FRC Dashboard Project and that will generate the custom dashboard project.

Then the Game Tools didn’t install properly.

Just uninstall the Game Tools and reinstall them again.
There is a new version of the Game Tools in any case here:

ni.com

FRC Game Tools Download

Download FRC Game Tools and find support information. You can use this download page to access FRC Game Tools and all available editions are available from this download page.

If you install the game tools with Labview open, i find that it doesn’t always install correctly. Make sure Labview is completely closed when doing the install.
